Title: Relates to possession and sale of armor piercing ammunition; repealer
Summary: Makes possession and sale of armor piercing ammunition a class B felony; includes exchanging and disposing of armor piercing ammunition.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to possession and sale of armor piercing ammunition; and to repeal subdivision 8 of section 265.01 of the penal law relating to armor piercing ammunition
